text: Giovanni Bramucci (15 November 1946 – 26 September 2019)Ciclismo in lutto, è scomparso Giovanni Bramucci was an Italian road cyclist. He was born in Civitavecchia, Italy. In 1968 he won bronze medals in the team time trial at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City and UCI Road World Championships.Giovanni Bramucci . sports-reference.com He finished eighth at the Olympics and tenth at the world championships. After that he turned professional, but had little success and retired in 1971.Giovanni Bramucci . cyclingarchives.com ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Italian cyclists
title: Giovanni Bramucci
